H0.text: Where in the human body can you find the 'Olfactory Bulb'. Brain

H1.text: Where in the human body can you find the 'Olfactory Bulb'. Mouth

H2.text: Where in the human body can you find the 'Olfactory Bulb'. Throat

H3.text: Where in the human body can you find the 'Olfactory Bulb'. NOSE

A4.text: In humans, however, the olfactory bulb is on the inferior (bottom) side of the brain.

A5.text: It is a major brain component in many vertebrates, but is greatly reduced in humans and other primates
